item.title: Hear directly from Microsoft Deputy CISO: Securing and governing the rise of autonomous agents
item.description: Howdy folks! When you've got a few minutes, I recommend reading (or listening to) the Microsoft Security blog post Securing and governing the rise of autonomous agents. My colleague Igor Saknov, CVP of Engineering and Deputy Chief Information Security Officer (CISO) for Identity, shares his thoughts on the new risks and responsibilities we're all facing with agents. Starting with the provocative question By 2026, enterprises may have more autonomous agents than human users. Are we ready to secure and govern them? Igor explains why agents are a new entity type, not just a minor extension of ex...
